Title: Thesis
Writer: Alejandro Amenábar (screenplay), Alejandro Amenábar (story), Mateo Gil (story)
Actors: Ana Torrent, Fele Martínez, Eduardo Noriega, Xabier Elorriaga
Plot: Why is death and violence so fascinating? Is it morally correct to show violence in movies? If so, is there a limit to what we should show? That's the subject of Ángela's examination paper. She is a young student at a film school in Madrid. Together with the student Chema (who is totally obsessed with violent movies) they find a snuff movie in which a young girl is tortured and killed. Soon they discover that the girl was a former student at their school...
Production: Las Producciones del Escorpión S.L., Sogepaq
